title: install.sh: ensure .gitignore does not exclude beads/starterpack files
description: Some target repos have .gitignore patterns that exclude .beads/, .starterpack/, .claude/, or *.jsonl files. The install script should detect and fix these patterns during install so the auto-commit includes all necessary files. Add a step between file copy and auto-commit that checks the root .gitignore and removes/negates problematic patterns.
close_reason: Added gitignore negation step to install.sh and set VERSION to v0.10.0
